title: A Cricket's Carol
description: We all know the story of the Magi and the wonderful gifts they brought that first Christmas Day. And we've all heard about grumpy, old Scrooge...how his life was changed forever by the special gift he received late on Christmas Eve. Settle back now...and enjoy the tale of little Toby Grey, a poor orphan boy who is granted one of the most special gifts of all time! "A Cricket's Carol", written by Mark Kimball Moulton and illustrated by Lisa Blowers, is a classic story for the young and young at heart. Focusing on the importance of family ties between our friends and neighbors, it reminds us that we must never lose hope for no one knows what special treasures may await around the very next bend! Each Lang Book is encased in a charming keepsake sleeve. 11-3/4"w x 10-3/4"h, 32 pages.
author: Mark Kimball Moulton
